templates.title: Cold Email - SaaS/Tech Companies
templates.description: High-converting cold email template for reaching SaaS or tech companies about AI services
templates.content:
Subject: Quick question about [COMPANY NAME]'s [SPECIFIC PROCESS]

Hi [FIRST NAME],

I noticed [COMPANY NAME] recently [SPECIFIC RECENT ACTIVITY - funding/launch/job posting]. Congrats.

I work with SaaS companies to automate [SPECIFIC PROCESS] using AI ‚Äî typically saving their team [X HOURS] per week while [SPECIFIC OUTCOME].

Did it for [SIMILAR COMPANY] last quarter. They went from [BEFORE STATE] to [AFTER STATE] in 6 weeks.

Worth a 15-minute chat to see if there's something similar I can do for [COMPANY NAME]?

[YOUR NAME]

P.S. No prep needed ‚Äî I'll do all the research before we talk.

templates.title: Cold Email - Local Service Businesses
templates.description: Cold email template for reaching local service businesses (restaurants, gyms, salons, etc.) about AI automation
templates.content:
Subject: [FIRST NAME] ‚Äî saving [BUSINESS TYPE] owners 10 hours/week

Hi [FIRST NAME],

Most [BUSINESS TYPE] owners I talk to are handling [SPECIFIC TASK] manually ‚Äî which takes [TIME ESTIMATE] a week and pulls you away from actually running the business.

I help [BUSINESS TYPE] businesses automate [SPECIFIC TASK] using AI tools. Usually takes about a week to set up and runs without touching it after that.

[REFERENCE NEARBY BUSINESS OR LOCAL DETAIL] made me think you'd be a good fit.

Happy to show you exactly how it works ‚Äî no tech knowledge needed on your end.

Would a quick call this week work?

[YOUR NAME]
[PHONE NUMBER]

templates.title: Cold Email - E-commerce Brands
templates.description: Cold email template targeting e-commerce brands for AI content, automation, or CX services
templates.content:
Subject: [BRAND NAME]'s [CONTENT/SUPPORT/ADS] ‚Äî quick thought

Hi [FIRST NAME],

Came across [BRAND NAME] while researching [THEIR NICHE] brands. Love what you're doing with [SPECIFIC PRODUCT OR CAMPAIGN].

Quick observation: [SPECIFIC OPPORTUNITY ‚Äî e.g., your product descriptions don't highlight X, your email sequences end after 3 touches, your ad creative is running the same angle for 60+ days].

I help DTC brands [SPECIFIC OUTCOME] using AI. Recent example: [BRAND TYPE] went from [BEFORE] to [AFTER] in [TIMEFRAME].

Would love to share a few ideas specifically for [BRAND NAME] ‚Äî no strings attached. Worth 20 minutes?

[YOUR NAME]

P.S. I already pulled your [SPECIFIC ASSET ‚Äî website/emails/ads] for review. Happy to share what I found.

templates.title: Cold Email - Coaches and Consultants
templates.description: Cold email template for coaches and consultants who could benefit from AI content or automation
templates.content:
Subject: Your content system ‚Äî are you doing this manually?

Hi [FIRST NAME],

I follow your work on [PLATFORM] ‚Äî really like [SPECIFIC CONTENT PIECE OR TOPIC THEY POST ABOUT].

Quick question: Are you personally writing all your [NEWSLETTER/SOCIAL CONTENT/COURSE MATERIALS], or do you have a system?

I help coaches and consultants build AI-powered content systems that generate a week of content in 2-3 hours. Stuff that sounds like them ‚Äî not generic AI.

[SPECIFIC PERSON IN THEIR SPACE] uses a version of this and it's freed up [TIME] per week for them to focus on client work.

Would it make sense to show you what this looks like for your situation?

[YOUR NAME]

templates.title: Cold Email - Marketing Agencies
templates.description: Cold email template for marketing agencies to offer white-label AI services or tools
templates.content:
Subject: Adding AI delivery to [AGENCY NAME]'s offering?

Hi [FIRST NAME],

Found [AGENCY NAME] through [HOW YOU FOUND THEM ‚Äî directory/referral/LinkedIn].

A few agencies I work with have added AI-powered [SPECIFIC SERVICE ‚Äî content/SEO/automation] to their stack ‚Äî delivered under their brand, fully white-labeled.

The economics work well: they're able to offer [SPECIFIC SERVICE] at [PRICE RANGE] with margins most aren't achieving on traditional delivery.

If you're exploring AI services for [AGENCY NAME]'s clients, I'd be happy to share exactly how this is structured and what the economics look like.

20 minutes this week?

[YOUR NAME]

P.S. No pitch ‚Äî I'm selective about who I work with. Just want to see if it's a fit.

templates.title: 30-Day Social Media Content Calendar
templates.description: A structured 30-day content calendar template for any niche or platform
templates.content:
# 30-Day Social Media Content Calendar
**Brand:** [YOUR BRAND]
**Platform(s):** [PLATFORMS]
**Monthly Theme:** [MONTHLY FOCUS THEME]
**Posting Frequency:** [X] posts/week

---

## CONTENT PILLARS
1. EDUCATIONAL: How-to content, tips, tutorials (40% of posts)
2. AUTHORITY: Case studies, results, testimonials (20% of posts)
3. ENTERTAINMENT: Behind-the-scenes, humor, personal (20% of posts)
4. PROMOTIONAL: Offers, services, products (20% of posts)

---

## WEEK 1: FOUNDATION
| Day | Pillar | Format | Topic | Hook | CTA | Status |
|-----|--------|--------|-------|------|-----|--------|
| Mon | Educational | Carousel | [TOPIC] | [HOOK LINE] | Save this | ‚ñ° |
| Wed | Authority | Static | [RESULT/WIN] | [HOOK LINE] | DM me | ‚ñ° |
| Fri | Entertainment | Reel | [BEHIND-SCENES] | [HOOK LINE] | Follow | ‚ñ° |

## WEEK 2: MOMENTUM
| Day | Pillar | Format | Topic | Hook | CTA | Status |
|-----|--------|--------|-------|------|-----|--------|
| Mon | Educational | Carousel | [TOPIC] | [HOOK LINE] | Share | ‚ñ° |
| Tue | Promotional | Static | [OFFER] | [HOOK LINE] | Link in bio | ‚ñ° |
| Thu | Authority | Video | [CASE STUDY] | [HOOK LINE] | Comment | ‚ñ° |
| Sat | Entertainment | Story | [POLL/Q&A] | [HOOK LINE] | Reply | ‚ñ° |

## WEEK 3: ENGAGEMENT PUSH
| Day | Pillar | Format | Topic | Hook | CTA | Status |
|-----|--------|--------|-------|------|-----|--------|
| Mon | Educational | Thread/Carousel | [TOPIC] | [HOOK LINE] | Save | ‚ñ° |
| Wed | Authority | Testimonial post | [CLIENT WIN] | [HOOK LINE] | DM | ‚ñ° |
| Fri | Entertainment | Reel | [TRENDING TOPIC] | [HOOK LINE] | Share | ‚ñ° |

## WEEK 4: CLOSE & CONVERT
| Day | Pillar | Format | Topic | Hook | CTA | Status |
|-----|--------|--------|-------|------|-----|--------|
| Mon | Educational | Carousel | [MONTH BEST OF] | [HOOK LINE] | Save | ‚ñ° |
| Tue | Promotional | Static + Story | [OFFER REMINDER] | [HOOK LINE] | DM | ‚ñ° |
| Thu | Authority | [TESTIMONIAL] | [RESULT] | [HOOK LINE] | Link | ‚ñ° |
| Sat | Entertainment | [PERSONAL] | [REFLECTION] | [HOOK LINE] | Follow | ‚ñ° |

---

## MONTHLY METRICS
- Total posts published: ___
- Average engagement rate: ___
- Follower growth: ___
- DMs/leads generated: ___
- Best performing post: ___
- Worst performing post: ___
- Next month adjustment: ___

templates.title: Client Proposal Template
templates.description: A professional client proposal template that covers all key sections to win projects
templates.content:
# PROJECT PROPOSAL
**Prepared for:** [CLIENT NAME / COMPANY]
**Prepared by:** [YOUR NAME / COMPANY]
**Date:** [DATE]
**Valid until:** [EXPIRY DATE ‚Äî 30 days recommended]

---

## EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
[CLIENT COMPANY] is facing [CORE PROBLEM IN 1-2 SENTENCES]. This proposal outlines how [YOUR COMPANY] will [SOLUTION IN 1 SENTENCE], delivering [SPECIFIC OUTCOME] within [TIMEFRAME].

---

## WE UNDERSTAND YOUR SITUATION
Based on our conversation on [DATE], here's what we understand about your current situation:
- [SPECIFIC PAIN POINT 1 ‚Äî use their exact words]
- [SPECIFIC PAIN POINT 2]
- [SPECIFIC PAIN POINT 3]
- [SPECIFIC GOAL OR DESIRED OUTCOME]

This tells us [INSIGHT THAT DEMONSTRATES YOU UNDERSTAND THEM].

---

## THE PROBLEM WE'RE SOLVING
[CLIENT COMPANY] is currently [SPECIFIC PROBLEM]. This is costing you:
- **Time:** [X HOURS/WEEK] spent on [MANUAL TASK]
- **Money:** Approximately $[COST ESTIMATE] per [PERIOD] in [CATEGORY]
- **Opportunity:** [SPECIFIC OPPORTUNITY BEING MISSED]

Without addressing this, [CONSEQUENCE OF INACTION].

---

## PROPOSED SOLUTION
We will [SPECIFIC SOLUTION] using [APPROACH/METHODOLOGY].

This will result in:
‚úì [SPECIFIC OUTCOME 1]
‚úì [SPECIFIC OUTCOME 2]
‚úì [SPECIFIC OUTCOME 3]

---

## SCOPE OF WORK & DELIVERABLES

### Phase 1: [PHASE NAME] (Weeks 1-[X])
- [DELIVERABLE 1] ‚Äî [FORMAT/SPECIFICATION]
- [DELIVERABLE 2] ‚Äî [FORMAT/SPECIFICATION]
- [MILESTONE: APPROVAL DATE]

### Phase 2: [PHASE NAME] (Weeks [X]-[Y])
- [DELIVERABLE 3] ‚Äî [FORMAT/SPECIFICATION]
- [DELIVERABLE 4] ‚Äî [FORMAT/SPECIFICATION]
- [MILESTONE: LAUNCH DATE]

**What's NOT included in this scope:**
- [EXCLUSION 1]
- [EXCLUSION 2]
- (Any additional requests will be handled as a change order)

---

## INVESTMENT

| Option | Includes | Investment |
|--------|----------|------------|
| **Starter** | [CORE DELIVERABLES] | $[PRICE] |
| **Growth** ‚≠ê | [MORE DELIVERABLES] | $[PRICE] |
| **Premium** | [FULL SCOPE + EXTRAS] | $[PRICE] |

*Payment terms: [50% upfront, 50% on delivery / Monthly / etc.]*
*Accepted payment: [Stripe / ACH / Check]*

---

## WHY [YOUR COMPANY]

**[PROOF POINT 1]:** [Specific result you achieved for a similar client]

**[PROOF POINT 2]:** [Years of experience / specific credential / methodology]

**[PROOF POINT 3]:** [Testimonial quote or another specific result]

---

## TIMELINE

| Milestone | Date |
|-----------|------|
| Project kickoff | [DATE] |
| [MILESTONE 1] | [DATE] |
| [MILESTONE 2] | [DATE] |
| Final delivery | [DATE] |

*Timeline assumes client provides required materials within [X] business days of each request.*

---

## NEXT STEPS

To move forward:
1. Review this proposal and let us know your questions
2. Select your preferred package
3. Sign the agreement and submit initial payment
4. We'll schedule your kickoff call within [24/48] hours

**To accept this proposal:** Reply "I'm ready to proceed" and we'll send the agreement and invoice.

This proposal is valid until [DATE].

---

## FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

**Q: What if I need changes to the scope?**
Additional work outside this scope is available at $[HOURLY/PROJECT RATE]. We'll always get your approval before proceeding.

**Q: What do you need from me to get started?**
[LIST 2-3 THINGS: access, assets, information]

**Q: What happens if I'm not happy with the work?**
[YOUR REVISION POLICY]

---

*Questions? [YOUR EMAIL] | [YOUR PHONE]*

templates.title: Service Package Pricing Template
templates.description: A clean service package pricing template with 3 tiers for any service business
templates.content:

‚úì [DELIVERABLE 1]
‚úì [DELIVERABLE 2]

‚úó [WHAT'S NOT INCLUDED]
‚úó [WHAT'S NOT INCLUDED]

Everything in [STARTER PACKAGE], plus:
‚úì [ADDITIONAL DELIVERABLE 1]

‚úì [ADDITIONAL DELIVERABLE 3]

## [PREMIUM PACKAGE NAME]

Everything in [CORE PACKAGE], plus:
‚úì [VIP FEATURE 1]
‚úì [VIP FEATURE 2]
‚úì [VIP FEATURE 3]
‚úì [VIP FEATURE 4 ‚Äî dedicated support / SLA / white-glove]

Turnaround: [X] business days (priority)

## ADD-ONS

| Service | Price |
|---------|-------|
| [ADD-ON 1] | $[PRICE] |
| [ADD-ON 2] | $[PRICE] |

| Rush delivery (48h) | +$[PRICE] |

---

## HOW TO GET STARTED
1. Choose your package above
2. Email [YOUR EMAIL] or book a call at [CALENDAR LINK]
3. We'll review your project and send an agreement within 24 hours

---

## FREQUENTLY ASKED

**How many clients do you take at once?** [CAPACITY NOTE]
**Is there a guarantee?** [YOUR GUARANTEE]

templates.title: Freelancer Client Onboarding Checklist
templates.description: Complete onboarding checklist for new freelance or agency clients
templates.content:
# CLIENT ONBOARDING CHECKLIST
**Client:** [CLIENT NAME]
**Project:** [PROJECT NAME]
**Start Date:** [DATE]
**Project Manager:** [YOUR NAME]

---

## BEFORE KICKOFF: YOUR TASKS
- [ ] Send signed contract to client
- [ ] Send invoice for deposit/first payment
- [ ] Confirm payment received
- [ ] Send welcome email (template: onboarding-welcome.txt)
- [ ] Create project folder in [CLOUD STORAGE]
- [ ] Set up project in [PROJECT MANAGEMENT TOOL]
- [ ] Create client portal / shared workspace
- [ ] Add client to [COMMUNICATION CHANNEL ‚Äî Slack/email thread]
- [ ] Schedule kickoff call
- [ ] Prepare kickoff call agenda

---

## INFORMATION TO COLLECT FROM CLIENT
- [ ] Brand guidelines (logo, colors, fonts)
- [ ] Access credentials: [LIST PLATFORMS NEEDED]
- [ ] Existing assets: [LIST ASSETS]
- [ ] Competitors list (3-5 names)
- [ ] Target audience description
- [ ] Goals and success metrics
- [ ] Key stakeholders and approvers
- [ ] Communication preferences (response time, channels)
- [ ] Any absolute restrictions or sensitivities
- [ ] Previous work in this area (if any)

---

## KICKOFF CALL AGENDA
- [ ] Introductions and relationship building (5 min)
- [ ] Review project goals and success criteria (10 min)
- [ ] Walk through project scope and deliverables (10 min)
- [ ] Review timeline and milestones (5 min)
- [ ] Communication cadence agreement (5 min)
- [ ] Collect remaining needed information (5 min)
- [ ] Q&A (5 min)
- [ ] Confirm next steps and dates (5 min)

---

## WEEK 1 MILESTONES
- [ ] Send kickoff call notes within 24 hours
- [ ] Complete initial research/strategy
- [ ] Share preliminary work for feedback
- [ ] Confirm Week 2 check-in time

---

## ONGOING PROJECT MANAGEMENT
- [ ] Weekly status update scheduled (every [DAY] at [TIME])
- [ ] Milestone approval process confirmed
- [ ] Revision request process documented
- [ ] Out-of-scope request process explained
- [ ] Emergency contact protocol shared

---

## BILLING SETUP
- [ ] Invoice schedule documented
- [ ] Payment method confirmed
- [ ] Receipt process confirmed
- [ ] Budget tracking started

---

## NOTES
[Space for project-specific notes]

templates.title: Content Repurposing Workflow
templates.description: Step-by-step content repurposing workflow to turn one piece into 10+ assets
templates.content:
# CONTENT REPURPOSING WORKFLOW

## STEP 1: IDENTIFY THE PILLAR PIECE
**Source content type:** [Long-form video / Podcast episode / Blog post / Workshop]
**Source content title:** [TITLE]
**Core message:** [ONE SENTENCE]
**Primary audience insight:** [KEY TAKEAWAY]

---

## STEP 2: EXTRACT KEY ASSETS

### From this one piece, extract:
- [ ] 5-8 quotable insights (single sentences or short paragraphs)
- [ ] 3-5 data points or statistics mentioned
- [ ] Top 5 actionable takeaways
- [ ] 2-3 story moments or examples
- [ ] The core framework or methodology (if any)

---

## STEP 3: REPURPOSE BY PLATFORM

### TWITTER/X (Create within 24 hours of publishing)
- [ ] Thread: [X main ideas from the piece]
- [ ] 5 standalone tweet quotes from the piece
- [ ] Poll based on a question raised in the piece

### LINKEDIN (Create within 48 hours)
- [ ] Long-form post: Top insight expanded with personal context
- [ ] Image quote from the best quote in the piece

### INSTAGRAM (Create within 48 hours)
- [ ] Carousel: 8-slide summary (1 cover + 6 points + 1 CTA)
- [ ] Story: Key stat or quote + poll

### TIKTOK/REELS (Create within 72 hours)
- [ ] 60-second summary video
- [ ] Clip or highlight if it was video content

### EMAIL/NEWSLETTER (Include in next newsletter)
- [ ] Newsletter section: 150-word excerpt with link
- [ ] Subject line options: [USE EMAIL SUBJECT LINE PROMPT]

### YOUTUBE (If podcast/workshop)
- [ ] Audiogram clip (1-2 minutes, best moment)
- [ ] YouTube description with full timestamps

### BLOG (Create within 1 week)
- [ ] Expand into 1,000-word blog post
- [ ] Add SEO optimization

---

## STEP 4: SCHEDULING GRID

| Platform | Asset Type | Scheduled Date | Status |
|----------|-----------|----------------|--------|
| Twitter | Thread | [DATE] | ‚ñ° |
| LinkedIn | Post | [DATE] | ‚ñ° |
| Instagram | Carousel | [DATE] | ‚ñ° |
| TikTok | Video | [DATE] | ‚ñ° |
| Email | Newsletter | [DATE] | ‚ñ° |
| Blog | Article | [DATE] | ‚ñ° |

---

## STEP 5: PERFORMANCE TRACKING (7 days after)

| Platform | Asset | Reach | Engagement | Leads | Best Performer? |
|----------|-------|-------|------------|-------|----------------|
| Twitter | Thread | | | | ‚ñ° |
| LinkedIn | Post | | | | ‚ñ° |
| Instagram | Carousel | | | | ‚ñ° |

**Insight for next repurpose:** [What performed best and why]

templates.title: Client Testimonial Request Email
templates.description: Email template to request powerful testimonials from happy clients
templates.content:
Subject: Quick favor? (+ congrats on [RESULT])

Hi [CLIENT FIRST NAME],

I just wanted to take a moment to say congratulations on [SPECIFIC RESULT YOU HELPED THEM ACHIEVE]. Seeing [SPECIFIC METRIC OR OUTCOME] has been genuinely exciting to watch.

I have a small favor to ask ‚Äî and I completely understand if you're too busy.

We're putting together some case studies to help other [CLIENT TYPE] businesses understand what's possible with AI [or your service]. Your story would be a perfect fit because of [SPECIFIC REASON ‚Äî unique situation, fast results, notable challenge overcome].

If you're willing, here are 3 questions that would take about 5-10 minutes to answer:

1. **Before we worked together:** What was the situation and what challenge were you trying to solve?

2. **During the work:** What was the process like and what stood out to you?

3. **After (now):** What specific results have you seen, and how has it impacted your business?

You can reply directly to this email, record a quick Loom, or if you'd prefer, I can schedule a 10-minute call and write it up for your review.

Whatever format works for you works for me.

Either way ‚Äî thank you for being such a great client to work with. Looking forward to our next project together.

[YOUR NAME]

P.S. If you feel comfortable sharing this publicly, it'll be featured on [YOUR WEBSITE/SOCIAL MEDIA]. If you'd prefer to keep it anonymous or private (for internal use only), that works perfectly too ‚Äî just let me know.

templates.title: Project Scope Document
templates.description: Watertight project scope document that prevents scope creep and miscommunication
templates.content:
# PROJECT SCOPE DOCUMENT

**Project Name:** [PROJECT NAME]
**Client:** [CLIENT COMPANY / NAME]
**Service Provider:** [YOUR NAME / COMPANY]
**Document Date:** [DATE]
**Agreement Date:** [DATE OF SIGNED CONTRACT]

---

## 1. PROJECT OVERVIEW
[2-3 sentence description of what this project is and what it will accomplish]

---

## 2. DELIVERABLES
The following deliverables will be produced under this agreement:

| # | Deliverable | Format | Specifications | Quantity | Due Date |
|---|------------|--------|----------------|----------|----------|
| 1 | [DELIVERABLE NAME] | [FORMAT ‚Äî PDF/Video/File type] | [SPECS] | [#] | [DATE] |
| 2 | [DELIVERABLE NAME] | [FORMAT] | [SPECS] | [#] | [DATE] |
| 3 | [DELIVERABLE NAME] | [FORMAT] | [SPECS] | [#] | [DATE] |

---

## 3. WHAT IS INCLUDED

‚úì [SPECIFIC INCLUDED SERVICE/FEATURE]
‚úì [SPECIFIC INCLUDED SERVICE/FEATURE]
‚úì [SPECIFIC INCLUDED SERVICE/FEATURE]
‚úì [NUMBER] rounds of revisions per deliverable
‚úì [COMMUNICATION INCLUDED ‚Äî weekly calls, Slack access, etc.]
‚úì [SUPPORT DURATION ‚Äî 30 days post-delivery]

---

## 4. WHAT IS NOT INCLUDED

‚úó [SPECIFIC EXCLUSION ‚Äî e.g., paid advertising costs]
‚úó [SPECIFIC EXCLUSION ‚Äî e.g., photography or video production]
‚úó [SPECIFIC EXCLUSION ‚Äî e.g., ongoing maintenance after 30 days]
‚úó [SPECIFIC EXCLUSION]
‚úó Any work not explicitly listed in Section 2 above

*Additional services are available at $[RATE] per hour or via a separate agreement.*

---

## 5. CLIENT RESPONSIBILITIES

For this project to proceed on schedule, the client agrees to:

- Provide [REQUIRED MATERIALS/ACCESS] within [X] business days of this agreement
- Provide feedback/approval on deliverables within [X] business days of submission
- Assign a primary point of contact: [CLIENT POC NAME]
- Respond to time-sensitive requests within [X] business hours
- [ANY OTHER CLIENT RESPONSIBILITIES]

*Delays in client-provided materials may result in timeline adjustments.*

---

## 6. TIMELINE

| Milestone | Deliverable | Due Date | Owner |
|-----------|------------|----------|-------|
| Project kickoff | Kickoff call | [DATE] | Both |
| [MILESTONE 1] | [DELIVERABLE] | [DATE] | Provider |
| [CLIENT APPROVAL 1] | Feedback due | [DATE] | Client |
| [MILESTONE 2] | [DELIVERABLE] | [DATE] | Provider |
| [CLIENT APPROVAL 2] | Feedback due | [DATE] | Client |
| Final delivery | All deliverables | [DATE] | Provider |

---

## 7. OUT-OF-SCOPE REQUESTS

Any request for work outside this scope will be handled as follows:
1. Service provider identifies the request as out-of-scope
2. Service provider provides a change order estimate within [X] business days
3. Client approves (or declines) the change order
4. Out-of-scope work does not begin until written approval is received
5. Change order rate: $[RATE] per hour or $[FLAT FEE] for [SPECIFIC TASK TYPE]

---

## 8. COMMUNICATION

- **Primary channel:** [EMAIL / SLACK / PROJECT TOOL]
- **Response time:** [X] business hours during [HOURS/DAYS]
- **Check-in cadence:** [WEEKLY CALL / ASYNC UPDATES]
- **Emergency contact:** [EMAIL/PHONE for urgent matters]

---

## 9. ACKNOWLEDGMENT

By proceeding with this project, both parties acknowledge they have read and agree to this scope document.

Provider: [YOUR SIGNATURE/INITIALS] ___________  Date: ___________
Client: ___________  Date: ___________

templates.title: 30-Day Launch Plan
templates.description: Complete 30-day launch plan template for any product, service, or business
templates.content:
# 30-DAY LAUNCH PLAN

**Product/Service:** [WHAT YOU'RE LAUNCHING]
**Launch Date:** [TARGET DATE]
**Revenue Goal:** $[TARGET] in [TIMEFRAME]
**Primary Channel:** [WHERE MOST SALES WILL COME FROM]

---

## PRE-LAUNCH PHASE (Days 1-10): BUILD ANTICIPATION

### Week 1: Foundation
**Day 1-2:** Setup
- [ ] Finalize product/service (stop tweaking)
- [ ] Set up payment processing (Stripe/PayPal/etc.)
- [ ] Build or finalize landing page
- [ ] Set up email capture/automation
- [ ] Create launch content folder

**Day 3-4:** Audience Warm-Up
- [ ] Email existing list: "Something exciting is coming" teaser
- [ ] Post behind-the-scenes content on [PLATFORM]
- [ ] Post on [PLATFORM]: Problem you're solving (no mention of product)
- [ ] Reach out to 10 warm prospects directly

**Day 5-7:** Social Proof Building
- [ ] Reach out to [X] beta users or early clients for testimonials
- [ ] Collect at least 3 testimonials or results screenshots
- [ ] Create case study from best testimonial
- [ ] Schedule all pre-launch content

---

### Week 2 (Days 8-14): Build Urgency
**Day 8:** Early Bird Announcement
- [ ] Email list: Early bird offer with deadline
- [ ] Social post: Announce early bird
- [ ] DM [X] warm prospects personally

**Days 9-10:** Education Posts
- [ ] Post: "The problem [PRODUCT] solves" (educational)
- [ ] Post: "Why [COMMON APPROACH] doesn't work" (contrarian)
- [ ] Email: Case study or proof point

**Days 11-13:** Engage and Answer
- [ ] Go live on [PLATFORM] or share behind-the-scenes
- [ ] Email: FAQ + address top objections
- [ ] DM anyone who engaged with launch content

**Day 14:** Early Bird Close
- [ ] Email: Last 24 hours of early bird pricing
- [ ] Social post: Last chance for early bird
- [ ] Send personal DMs to anyone who showed interest

---

## LAUNCH PHASE (Days 15-21): SELL

**Day 15 (LAUNCH DAY):**
- [ ] Email list: Full launch announcement
- [ ] Social post: It's live (with link)
- [ ] Personal outreach to warm list (DMs/texts)

**Days 16-19:**
- [ ] Email: Testimonial/social proof email
- [ ] Email: Address the #1 objection
- [ ] Social posts: Daily value + soft CTA each day
- [ ] Engage with all comments and DMs personally

**Days 20-21 (Urgency Close):**
- [ ] Email: 48 hours remaining
- [ ] Email: Final day (24 hours)
- [ ] Social: Urgency posts
- [ ] Personal outreach to fence-sitters

---

## POST-LAUNCH PHASE (Days 22-30): OPTIMIZE

**Days 22-24:**
- [ ] Send onboarding sequence to all new buyers
- [ ] Collect initial feedback
- [ ] Address any early issues immediately

**Days 25-27:**
- [ ] Analyze: What worked vs. what didn't
- [ ] Collect testimonials from early buyers
- [ ] Decide: Evergreen the offer or do another launch?

**Days 28-30:**
- [ ] Compile launch debrief (revenue, metrics, lessons)
- [ ] Plan next launch or ongoing sales strategy
- [ ] Celebrate the wins!

---

## LAUNCH METRICS

| Metric | Goal | Actual |
|--------|------|--------|
| Revenue | $[TARGET] | |
| Units sold | [#] | |
| Email open rate | [%]+ | |
| Conversion rate | [%] | |
| Refund rate | <[%] | |
| Testimonials collected | [#]+ | |

---

## LAUNCH DEBRIEF NOTES
[Space for post-launch notes]

templates.title: AI Automation Audit Template
templates.description: Template to audit a client's business for AI automation opportunities
templates.content:
# AI AUTOMATION AUDIT
**Company:** [CLIENT COMPANY]
**Audit Date:** [DATE]
**Conducted by:** [YOUR NAME]

---

## SECTION 1: BUSINESS OVERVIEW
- Primary revenue streams: [LIST]
- Team size: [#] employees
- Current tools/software: [LIST KEY TOOLS]
- Biggest operational bottleneck: [ANSWER FROM DISCOVERY]

---

## SECTION 2: PROCESS AUDIT

For each department/function, rate current automation (1=fully manual, 5=fully automated):

| Process Area | Current State | Automation Score (1-5) | Time Spent/Week | Notes |
|-------------|---------------|----------------------|-----------------|-------|
| Lead generation | | | | |
| Lead qualification | | | | |
| Proposal creation | | | | |
| Client onboarding | | | | |
| Project management | | | | |
| Content creation | | | | |
| Customer support | | | | |
| Invoicing/billing | | | | |
| Reporting/analytics | | | | |
| Email management | | | | |
| Social media | | | | |
| Data entry/transfers | | | | |

---

## SECTION 3: OPPORTUNITY ANALYSIS

### HIGH-VALUE AUTOMATIONS (Quick wins):
1. **[PROCESS]:** [CURRENT STATE] ‚Üí [AUTOMATED STATE] ‚Äî Saves ~[X] hours/week
2. **[PROCESS]:** [CURRENT STATE] ‚Üí [AUTOMATED STATE] ‚Äî Saves ~[X] hours/week
3. **[PROCESS]:** [CURRENT STATE] ‚Üí [AUTOMATED STATE] ‚Äî Saves ~[X] hours/week

### MEDIUM-VALUE AUTOMATIONS (Moderate effort):
4. **[PROCESS]:** [DESCRIPTION] ‚Äî Saves ~[X] hours/week
5. **[PROCESS]:** [DESCRIPTION] ‚Äî Saves ~[X] hours/week

### COMPLEX AUTOMATIONS (Strategic):
6. **[PROCESS]:** [DESCRIPTION] ‚Äî Saves ~[X] hours/week

---

## SECTION 4: RECOMMENDATION PRIORITY MATRIX

| # | Automation | Value | Effort | Priority |
|---|-----------|-------|--------|----------|
| 1 | [AUTOMATION] | High | Low | ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê Do First |
| 2 | [AUTOMATION] | High | Medium | ‚≠ê‚≠ê Do Second |
| 3 | [AUTOMATION] | Medium | Low | ‚≠ê‚≠ê Do Second |
| 4 | [AUTOMATION] | High | High | ‚≠ê Plan Carefully |
| 5 | [AUTOMATION] | Low | Low | Do if Time Permits |

---

## SECTION 5: RECOMMENDED NEXT STEPS

**Phase 1 (Start immediately):**
- [ ] [SPECIFIC ACTION 1]
- [ ] [SPECIFIC ACTION 2]

**Phase 2 (Within 30 days):**
- [ ] [SPECIFIC ACTION 3]
- [ ] [SPECIFIC ACTION 4]

**Phase 3 (Within 90 days):**
- [ ] [SPECIFIC ACTION 5]
- [ ] [SPECIFIC ACTION 6]

---

## SECTION 6: ESTIMATED ROI

| Metric | Current | After Automation |
|--------|---------|-----------------|
| Hours spent on manual tasks/week | [X] hrs | [Y] hrs |
| Hours saved/week | ‚Äî | [X-Y] hrs |
| Dollar value of time saved/week | ‚Äî | $[VALUE] |
| Annual value of automation | ‚Äî | $[ANNUAL] |
| Implementation cost | ‚Äî | $[YOUR FEE] |
| **ROI (1 year)** | ‚Äî | **[%]** |

---

*This audit was prepared based on [DATE] discovery session. Full implementation details available upon request.*

templates.title: Lead Magnet Delivery Email Sequence
templates.description: 4-email lead magnet delivery and nurture sequence template
templates.content:
# LEAD MAGNET DELIVERY SEQUENCE

---

## EMAIL 1: DELIVERY (Send immediately)

**Subject:** Here's your [LEAD MAGNET NAME] + one quick thing

Hi [FIRST NAME],

Here's the [LEAD MAGNET NAME] you requested:
üëâ [DOWNLOAD LINK / ACCESS LINK]

Quick heads-up: The most important part is [SPECIFIC SECTION/PAGE/TIP]. Most people skip it. Don't.

Over the next few days, I'll share a few things to help you get even more out of this. Short, practical, no fluff.

Talk soon,
[YOUR NAME]

P.S. Got a question? Just reply. I actually read these.

---

## EMAIL 2: QUICK WIN (Day 2)

**Subject:** Did you try [SPECIFIC TACTIC FROM LEAD MAGNET] yet?

Hi [FIRST NAME],

Hope you had a chance to look through [LEAD MAGNET NAME].

The one thing I hear from most people: "[COMMON DOUBT OR OBSTACLE]."

Here's what I tell them: [SHORT, DIRECT INSIGHT THAT ADDRESSES THAT OBSTACLE].

The fastest way to see results is to [SPECIFIC FIRST ACTION]. Takes [TIME ESTIMATE] to do.

If you try it and get stuck, hit reply and tell me where. I'll help.

[YOUR NAME]

---

## EMAIL 3: PROOF (Day 4)

**Subject:** [REAL RESULT] from doing exactly what's in [LEAD MAGNET NAME]

Hi [FIRST NAME],

[FIRST NAME OF PERSON IN YOUR STORY] had the exact situation you're probably in right now.

[SPECIFIC BEFORE STATE ‚Äî 1-2 sentences]

They used [SPECIFIC STRATEGY FROM LEAD MAGNET].

[SPECIFIC AFTER RESULT ‚Äî 1-2 sentences with numbers if possible]

Here's the part that matters: They didn't have [THING PEOPLE THINK IS REQUIRED ‚Äî more experience/time/money]. They just started.

If [WHAT YOU HELP PEOPLE DO] is something you're working toward, I'd love to share how [YOUR SERVICE/PRODUCT] could help.

No pressure at all ‚Äî but if you're curious, [CTA: reply 'tell me more' / click here / book a call].

[YOUR NAME]

---

## EMAIL 4: SOFT OFFER (Day 7)

**Subject:** Quick question for you, [FIRST NAME]

Hi [FIRST NAME],

This is my last email in this series ‚Äî I know your inbox is full and I respect your time.

One question before I sign off: Is [SPECIFIC PAIN POINT YOUR OFFER SOLVES] something you're actively working on right now?

If yes, I think [YOUR SERVICE/PRODUCT] could be exactly what you need. Here's what it includes: [2-3 BULLET POINTS].

[CTA BUTTON OR LINK: Learn More / Book a Call / See the Offer]

If now's not the right time, totally fine ‚Äî you can come back to this whenever you're ready.

Either way, I hope [LEAD MAGNET NAME] gave you something useful.

[YOUR NAME]

P.S. Still have the [LEAD MAGNET NAME] if you need the link again: [LINK]

templates.title: Discovery Call Intake Form
templates.description: Pre-call intake form to qualify prospects before discovery calls
templates.content:
# DISCOVERY CALL APPLICATION FORM

**Instructions:** Please complete this form before our [DATE/TIME] call. This helps me prepare and ensures we use our time together as effectively as possible.

---

## YOUR INFORMATION
Name: _______________________________________________
Company: _______________________________________________
Website: _______________________________________________
LinkedIn: _______________________________________________
Best phone: _______________________________________________

---

## ABOUT YOUR SITUATION

**1. In 2-3 sentences, describe what you do and who you serve:**
_______________________________________________
_______________________________________________

**2. What is the specific challenge or goal that prompted you to book this call?**
_______________________________________________
_______________________________________________

**3. How long have you been dealing with this challenge?**
‚ñ° Less than 1 month
‚ñ° 1-3 months
‚ñ° 3-6 months
‚ñ° 6-12 months
‚ñ° More than a year

**4. What have you already tried to solve this?**
_______________________________________________
_______________________________________________

**5. On a scale of 1-10, how urgent is solving this right now?** (1 = not urgent, 10 = critical)
‚ñ° 1-3 (Exploring options)
‚ñ° 4-6 (Moderate urgency)
‚ñ° 7-9 (High urgency)
‚ñ° 10 (This is costing me significantly every week)

---

## GOALS & EXPECTATIONS

**6. What does success look like in 90 days if we work together?**
_______________________________________________
_______________________________________________

**7. What would make this a "10/10 investment" for you?**
_______________________________________________

---

## PRACTICAL DETAILS

**8. Are you the primary decision-maker for this investment?**
‚ñ° Yes, I make this decision alone
‚ñ° I need to consult with [partner/team/spouse]
‚ñ° I present to someone else (who: _______________)

**9. What is your budget range for solving this problem?**
‚ñ° Under $500
‚ñ° $500 - $1,500
‚ñ° $1,500 - $3,000
‚ñ° $3,000 - $5,000
‚ñ° $5,000+
‚ñ° I'm not sure yet ‚Äî I need to understand ROI first

**10. When are you looking to get started?**
‚ñ° Immediately (this week)
‚ñ° Within 30 days
‚ñ° 1-3 months
‚ñ° Just exploring for now

---

## ANYTHING ELSE

**11. Is there anything else I should know before our call?**
_______________________________________________
_______________________________________________

---

*I look forward to speaking with you. I'll review your answers before our call and come prepared with specific ideas for your situation.*

**Trigger:** [What starts this workflow ‚Äî time-based, event-based, manual]
**Output:** [What this workflow produces]
**Time required:** [How long it takes to run]
**Who runs it:** [Role/person]
**Frequency:** [How often it runs]

---

## PREREQUISITES

Before running this workflow, ensure:
- [ ] [REQUIRED TOOL/ACCESS 1] is set up and connected
- [ ] [REQUIRED INPUT ‚Äî file, data, account] is available
- [ ] [REQUIRED PERMISSION/SUBSCRIPTION] is active

1. Open [TOOL/PLATFORM]
2. [SPECIFIC ACTION]

```

```

1. [ACTION]
2. [ACTION]
**Expected output:** [DESCRIPTION]
**Quality check:** [VERIFICATION METHOD]

---

[Continue same format for each step]

---

## QUALITY STANDARDS

The output of this workflow is acceptable when:
- [ ] [STANDARD 1]
- [ ] [STANDARD 2]
- [ ] [STANDARD 3]

If output doesn't meet these standards, [WHAT TO DO ‚Äî retry, adjust prompt, escalate].

---

## TOOLS USED

| Tool | Purpose | Cost | Login |
|------|---------|------|-------|
| [TOOL 1] | [PURPOSE] | $[COST]/mo | [WHERE TO FIND LOGIN] |
| [TOOL 2] | [PURPOSE] | $[COST]/mo | [WHERE TO FIND LOGIN] |

---

## TROUBLESHOOTING

| Problem | Likely Cause | Solution |
|---------|-------------|----------|
| [PROBLEM] | [CAUSE] | [SOLUTION] |
| [PROBLEM] | [CAUSE] | [SOLUTION] |

---

## REVISION HISTORY

| Date | Changed by | What changed |
|------|-----------|-------------|
| [DATE] | [NAME] | Initial creation |
| [DATE] | [NAME] | [CHANGE] |
